name: server.R
content: library(shiny) library(bslib) library(shinyjs) # library(shinyvalidate) # library(bootstrap) val_1_0 <- val_2_0 <- val_3_0 <- val_4_0 <- val_5_0 <- val_7_0 <- val_8_0 <- 0 # col 0 val_1_1 <- val_2_1 <- val_3_1 <- val_4_1 <- val_5_1 <- val_7_1 <- val_8_1 <- 1 # col 1 val_1_2 <- val_2_2 <- val_3_2 <- val_4_2 <- val_5_2 <- 2 # col 2 prev_old = 0.36 beta0 = -3.385002 beta1 = 0.9604383 beta2 = 0.9948123 se0 = 0.7521711 se1 = 0.2988397 se2 = 0.2425303 cov01 = -0.17974909 cov02 = -0.10916312 cov12 = 0.01822702 # Define server logic ---- server <- function(input, output, session) { score_1 <- reactiveVal() score_2 <- reactiveVal() score_3 <- reactiveVal() score_4 <- reactiveVal() score_5 <- reactiveVal() score_7 <- reactiveVal() score_8 <- reactiveVal() score_white_matter <- c(score_1, score_2, score_3) score_grey_matter <- c(score_4, score_5, score_7, score_8) #====== ROW 1 ================================================================ observeEvent(input$btn_1_0,{ updateButton(session,'btn_1_0',style = "primary") updateButton(session,'btn_1_1',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_1_2',style = "default") score_1(val_1_0) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_1", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("0-square") ) }) observeEvent(input$btn_1_1,{ updateButton(session,'btn_1_0',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_1_1',style = "primary") updateButton(session,'btn_1_2',style = "default") score_1(val_1_1) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_1", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("1-square") ) }) observeEvent(input$btn_1_2,{ updateButton(session,'btn_1_0',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_1_1',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_1_2',style = "primary") score_1(val_1_2) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_1", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("2-square") ) }) #====== ROW 2 ================================================================ observeEvent(input$btn_2_0,{ updateButton(session,'btn_2_0',style = "primary") updateButton(session,'btn_2_1',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_2_2',style = "default") score_2(val_2_0) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_2", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("0-square") ) }) observeEvent(input$btn_2_1,{ updateButton(session,'btn_2_0',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_2_1',style = "primary") updateButton(session,'btn_2_2',style = "default") score_2(val_2_1) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_2", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("1-square") ) }) observeEvent(input$btn_2_2,{ updateButton(session,'btn_2_0',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_2_1',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_2_2',style = "primary") score_2(val_2_2) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_2", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("2-square") ) }) #====== ROW 3 ================================================================ observeEvent(input$btn_3_0,{ updateButton(session,'btn_3_0',style = "primary") updateButton(session,'btn_3_1',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_3_2',style = "default") score_3(val_3_0) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_3", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("0-square") ) }) observeEvent(input$btn_3_1,{ updateButton(session,'btn_3_0',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_3_1',style = "primary") updateButton(session,'btn_3_2',style = "default") score_3(val_3_1) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_3", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("1-square") ) }) observeEvent(input$btn_3_2,{ updateButton(session,'btn_3_0',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_3_1',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_3_2',style = "primary") score_3(val_3_2) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_3", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("2-square") ) }) #====== ROW 4 ================================================================ observeEvent(input$btn_4_0,{ updateButton(session,'btn_4_0',style = "primary") updateButton(session,'btn_4_1',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_4_2',style = "default") score_4(val_4_0) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_4", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("0-square") ) }) observeEvent(input$btn_4_1,{ updateButton(session,'btn_4_0',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_4_1',style = "primary") updateButton(session,'btn_4_2',style = "default") score_4(val_4_1) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_4", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("1-square") ) }) observeEvent(input$btn_4_2,{ updateButton(session,'btn_4_0',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_4_1',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_4_2',style = "primary") score_4(val_4_2) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_4", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("2-square") ) }) #====== ROW 5 ================================================================ observeEvent(input$btn_5_0,{ updateButton(session,'btn_5_0',style = "primary") updateButton(session,'btn_5_1',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_5_2',style = "default") score_5(val_5_0) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_5", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("0-square") ) }) observeEvent(input$btn_5_1,{ updateButton(session,'btn_5_0',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_5_1',style = "primary") updateButton(session,'btn_5_2',style = "default") score_5(val_5_1) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_5", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("1-square") ) }) observeEvent(input$btn_5_2,{ updateButton(session,'btn_5_0',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_5_1',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_5_2',style = "primary") score_5(val_5_2) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_5", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("2-square") ) }) #====== ROW 7 ================================================================ observeEvent(input$btn_7_0,{ updateButton(session,'btn_7_0',style = "primary") updateButton(session,'btn_7_1',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_7_2',style = "default") score_7(val_7_0) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_7", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("0-square") ) }) observeEvent(input$btn_7_1,{ updateButton(session,'btn_7_0',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_7_1',style = "primary") updateButton(session,'btn_7_2',style = "default") score_7(val_7_1) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_7", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("1-square") ) }) #====== ROW 8 ================================================================ observeEvent(input$btn_8_0,{ updateButton(session,'btn_8_0',style = "primary") updateButton(session,'btn_8_1',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_8_2',style = "default") score_8(val_8_0) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_8", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("0-square") ) }) observeEvent(input$btn_8_1,{ updateButton(session,'btn_8_0',style = "default") updateButton(session,'btn_8_1',style = "primary") updateButton(session,'btn_8_2',style = "default") score_8(val_8_1) bslib::accordion_panel_update( id = "accordion", target = "panel_8", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("1-square") ) }) prev_new <- reactive(input$new_prev) ci <- reactive(input$ci) alpha <- reactive((100-as.numeric(ci()))/100) z <- reactive(qnorm(1-alpha()/2)) prob <- reactive({ if(is.numeric(score_1()) && is.numeric(score_2()) && is.numeric(score_3()) && is.numeric(score_4()) && is.numeric(score_5()) && is.numeric(score_7()) && is.numeric(score_8()) ) { wm_score <- score_1() +score_2() + score_3() gm_score <- score_4() +score_5() + score_7() + score_8() b0_new <- beta0 + log(prev_new() /(1- prev_new())) - log(prev_old / (1-prev_old)) logit <- b0_new + beta1 * wm_score + beta2 * gm_score varLogit <- (se0**2) + (se1**2) * (wm_score**2) + (se2**2) * (gm_score**2) + 2 * cov01 * wm_score + 2 * cov02 * gm_score + 2 * cov12 * wm_score * gm_score seLogit <- sqrt(varLogit) logitLL <- logit - z() * seLogit logitUL <- logit + z() * seLogit p <- 100 * exp(b0_new + beta1 * wm_score + beta2 * gm_score) / (1 + exp(b0_new + beta1 * wm_score + beta2 * gm_score)) pLL <- 100 * exp(logitLL)/(1 + exp(logitLL)) pUL = 100 * exp(logitUL)/(1 + exp(logitUL)) # print(as.character(round(p))) # # print(as.character(round(pLL))) # # print(as.character(round(pUL))) # paste0("Probability of an adverse outcome at the age of 2 years: ", as.character(round(p)), "% (", as.character(ci()), "% CI: ", as.character(round(pLL)), " to ", as.character(round(pUL)), ")") } # END IF }) # END REACTIVE output$prob <- renderUI({ HTML(paste0("",as.character(prob()), "")) }) } # END Server # https://nanx.me/blog/post/responsive-design-for-statistical-graphics/

name: ui.R
content:
library(shiny) library(shinyBS) library(bslib) # bs_theme library(rmarkdown) library(markdown) library(shinythemes) ui <- page_fluid( theme = bs_theme(bootswatch = "cerulean"), card( card_title( "A cranial ultrasound scoring system for (near) term infants with hypoxic-ischemic encephalopahy", container = htmltools::h4), h6("Select the sonographic description that matches the patient's images, (the prevalence at your center) and the desired confidence interval"), accordion( id = "accordion", multiple=FALSE, # open = c("CALCULATOR"), accordion_panel( value = "panel_1", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("app"), title = "Impaired white/grey matter differentiation and/or slit-like ventricles", bsButton(inputId = "btn_1_0", label = HTML("

Normal differentiation between grey and white matter and open ventricles.

"), style = "default", # style = "color: white; background-color: blue;", width = '100%'), br(), bsButton(inputId = "btn_1_1", label = HTML("

Reduced differentiation between grey and white matter and/or slit-like ventricles.

"), style = "default", width = '100%'), br(), bsButton(inputId = "btn_1_2", label = HTML("

No differentiation between grey and whitematter and slit-like ventricles.

"), style = "default", width = '100%') ), accordion_panel( value = "panel_2", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("app"), title = "Hyperechogenicity periventricular white matter", bsButton(inputId = "btn_2_0", label = HTML("

Normal echogenicity or minor hyperechogenicity.

"), style = "default", # style = "color: white; background-color: blue;", width = '100%'), br(), bsButton(inputId = "btn_2_1", label = HTML("

Moderate or focal hyperechogenicity, not as white as choroid plexus.

"), style = "default", width = '100%'), br(), bsButton(inputId = "btn_2_2", label = HTML("

Severe and diffuse hyperechogenicity, as white as choroid plexus.

"), style = "default", width = '100%') ), accordion_panel( value = "panel_3", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("app"), title = "Hyperechogenicity subcortical white matter", bsButton(inputId = "btn_3_0", label = HTML("

Normal echogenicity or minor hyperechogenicity.

"), style = "default", # style = "color: white; background-color: blue;", width = '100%'), br(), bsButton(inputId = "btn_3_1", label = HTML("

Focal hyperechogenicity of the subcortical white matter. Moderate differentiation of white and (subcortical) grey matter.

"), style = "default", width = '100%'), br(), bsButton(inputId = "btn_3_2", label = HTML("

Clear 'tramlines' sign; hyperechogenicity of subcortical white matter almost similar to sulci with hyposignal intensity of cortex in between.

"), style = "default", width = '100%') ), accordion_panel( value = "panel_4", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("app"), title = "Hyperechogenicity thalamus", bsButton(inputId = "btn_4_0", label = HTML("

Normal echogenicity or minor hyperechogenicity.

"), style = "default", # style = "color: white; background-color: blue;", width = '100%'), br(), bsButton(inputId = "btn_4_1", label = HTML("

Moderate or focal hyperechogenicity thalamus.

"), style = "default", width = '100%'), br(), bsButton(inputId = "btn_4_2", label = HTML("

The hyperechogenicity is severe and diffuse.

"), style = "default", width = '100%') ), accordion_panel( value = "panel_5", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("app"), title = "Hyperechogenicity putamen", bsButton(inputId = "btn_5_0", label = HTML("

Normal echogenicity or minor hyperechogenicity.

"), style = "default", # style = "color: white; background-color: blue;", width = '100%'), br(), bsButton(inputId = "btn_5_1", label = HTML("

Moderate or focal hyperechogenicity putamen

"), style = "default", width = '100%'), br(), bsButton(inputId = "btn_5_2", label = HTML("

The hyperechogenicity is severe and diffuse.

"), style = "default", width = '100%') ), accordion_panel( value = "panel_7", icon = bsicons::bs_icon("app"), title = "Four column sign", bsButton(inputId = "btn_7_0", label = HTML("

Normal echogenicity or minor hyperechogenicity.

"), style = "default", # style = "color: white; background-color: blue;", width = '100%'), br(), bsButton(inputId = "btn_7_1", label = HTML("

On the coronal cUS plane there is a four column sign caused by moderate or severe bilateral hyperechogenicity of the thalamus and putamen.

"), style = "default", width = '100%'), ), accordion_panel( icon = bsicons::bs_icon("app"), value = "panel_8", title = "Visibility PLIC", bsButton(inputId = "btn_8_0", label = HTML("

The PLIC is not visible as a hypo-echogenic line between the putamen and thalamus.

"), style = "default", # style = "color: white; background-color: blue;", width = '100%'), br(), bsButton(inputId = "btn_8_1", label = HTML("

The PLIC is clearly visible as a hypo-echogenic line between the hyperechogenic putamen and thalamus.

"), style = "default", width = '100%'), ) ), # END ACCORDION numericInput("new_prev", "Prevalence: ", value = 0.35, min = 0.25, max = 0.75, step = 0.01), selectInput("ci", "CI: ", choices = c(90, 95, 99), selected = 95), # "CI: " ), card( card_title( "Prognosis", container = htmltools::h4), htmlOutput('prob') ), card( card_title( "Background - references", container = htmltools::h4), includeMarkdown("annink.md") ), )

name: annink.md
content:
Study synopsis:
Retrospective cohort study.
Derivation cohort: 83 (near) term newborns (36 through 42 weeks’ gestational age) with HIE and treated with whole body cooling. Excluded were infants with metabolic or genetic abnormalities.
Prognostic test: cranial ultrasound scoring system (imaging between days 3 and 7 after birth). Interrater variability was moderate between observers.
Definition of adverse outcome (AO): death, cerebral palsy or a cognitive/motor composite score <85 according to the Bayley Scales of Infant and Toddler Development (third edition) at 2 years of age.
Incidence of adverse outcome in derivation cohort: 0.35
Data analysis by multivariate logistic regression analysis:
Probability of AO = 1 / (1 + EXP(-(-3.385+0.960·white matter score+0.995·grey matter score))
Prognostic accuracy: AUC = 0.90 (95% CI 0.83–0.98) in derivation cohort (n= 83); AUC = 0.89 (95% CI 0.77-1.00) in validation cohort (n=35). No calibration curve available.
Note :
In this calculator the pre-test probability (prevalence of adverse outcome) can be changed. The beta0 and the predicted probability will be adjusted accordingly. The assumption is that the odds ratios and the regression coefficients beta1 and beta2 are independent of prevalence, while only the intercept beta0 depends on the pre-test probability. In a meta-analysis on therapeutic hypothermia death and moderate/severe disability at 18 months occurred in 294/616 (48%) infants. The prevalence of adverse outcome (after cooling) was 64% in severe and 35% in moderate HIE.
Reference:
Annink KV, de Vries LS, Groenendaal F, Vijlbrief DC, Weeke LC, Roehr CC, Lequin M, Reiss I, Govaert P, Benders MJNL, Dudink J. The development and validation of a cerebral ultrasound scoring system for infants with hypoxic-ischaemic encephalopathy. Pediatr Res. 2020 Mar;87(Suppl 1):59-66. https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32218538/
Tagin MA, Woolcott CG, Vincer MJ, Whyte RK, Stinson DA. Hypothermia for neonatal hypoxic ischemic encephalopathy: an updated systematic review and meta-analysis. Arch Pediatr Adolesc Med 2012; 166(6): 558-66. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/22312166
